name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets PROLOGUE
name_original: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets PROLOGUE
description:
Jack Holmes : Master of Puppets PROLOGUE is a short game that serves as an introduction to the story that takes place in the main game.

Eddie has been waiting for weeks for the day when he finally goes to the amusement park with his parents. But at one attraction something unexpected will happen...

  • Join Eddie on an adventure and immerse yourself in the terrifying atmosphere that awaits you in this fair of horrors.

  • Survive the traps that have been prepared exclusively for you in this crazy experiment.

  • If you make it to the end, get ready to meet someone very special...
